required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Donanemab (LY3002813) in Participants With Early Alzheimer's Disease (TRAILBLAZER-ALZ 2)
clinical_study.official_title: Assessment of Safety, Tolerability, and Efficacy of Donanemab in Early Symptomatic Alzheimer's Disease

brief_summary.textblock:
The reason for this study is to see how safe and effective the study drug donanemab is in participants with early Alzheimer's disease.
Additional participants will be enrolled to an addendum safety cohort. The participants will be administered open-label donanemab.

detailed_description.textblock:
TRAILBLAZER-ALZ 2 is a Phase 3, double-blind, placebo-controlled study to evaluate the safety and efficacy of N3pG antibody (donanemab) in participants with early symptomatic AD (prodromal AD and mild dementia due to AD) with the presence of brain tau pathology.
Following the double-blind 76-week main study period, a double-blind 78-week long-term extension period is added to further evaluate donanemab efficacy and safety over time. Participants from the addendum safety cohort are not eligible for the extension period.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline on the integrated Alzheimer's Disease Rating Scale (iADRS)
primary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline on the iADRS in participants with early symptomatic AD in at least one of 'the low-medium tau pathology population or the overall population'.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline on the Mini Mental State Examination (MMSE) Score
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline on the MMSE Score in participants with early symptomatic AD in at least one of 'the low-medium tau pathology population or the overall population'.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline on the Alzheimer's Disease Assessment Scale - Cognitive Subscale (ADAS-Cog13)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline on the ADAS-Cog13 in participants with early symptomatic AD in at least one of 'the low-medium tau pathology population or the overall population'

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline on the Clinical Dementia Rating Scale-Sum of Boxes (CDR-SB)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline on the CDR-SB in participants with early symptomatic AD in at least one of 'the low-medium tau pathology population or the overall population'.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline on the Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study - instrumental Activities of Daily Living (ADCS-iADL) Score
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline on the ADCS-iADL Score in participants with early symptomatic AD in at least one of 'the low-medium tau pathology population or the overall population'.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Brain Amyloid Plaque Deposition as Measured by Florbetapir F18 Positron Emission Tomography (PET) Scan
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Brain Amyloid Plaque Deposition as measured by Florbetapir F18 PET Scan

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Brain Tau Deposition as Measured by Flortaucipir F18 PET Scan
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Brain Tau Deposition as Measured by Flortaucipir F18 PET Scan

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Brain Volume as Measured by volumetric Magnetic Resonance Imaging (vMRI)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Brain Volume as Measured by vMRI

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK): Average Serum Concentration at Steady State of Donanemab
secondary_outcome.description: PK: Average Serum Concentration at steady state of Donanemab

secondary_outcome.measure: Number or Participants with Anti-Donanemab Antibodies
secondary_outcome.description: Number or Participants with Anti-Donanemab Antibodies

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Gradual and progressive change in memory function reported by participants or informants for â‰¥ 6 months
- MMSE score of 20 to 28 (inclusive) at baseline
- Meet 18F flortaucipir PET scan (central read) criteria - does not apply to safety cohort
- Meet 18F florbetapir PET scan (central read) criteria
- Have a study partner who will provide written informed consent to participate
Exclusion Criteria:
- Contraindication to MRI or PET scans
- Current treatment with immunoglobulin G (IgG) therapy

link.description: A Study of Donanemab (LY3002813) in Participants with Early Alzheimer's Disease (TRAILBLAZER-ALZ 2)

patient_data.ipd_description: Anonymized individual patient level data will be provided in a secure access environment upon approval of a research proposal and a signed data sharing agreement.
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: Data are available 6 months after the primary publication and approval of the indication studied in the US and EU, whichever is later. Data will be indefinitely available for requesting.
patient_data.ipd_access_criteria: A research proposal must be approved by an independent review panel and researchers must sign a data sharing agreement.
